name: CodeYeti
description:
CodeYeti is an emerging Digital Agency, innovating and delivering best in its domain. We keep a check on rapidly changing digital trends and implement the bet of technology, creativity and analytical expertise in our services.
We have maintained successful clientage within a very short span of time and are rated amongst the top 50 hottest rated startups.  You can check our portfolio at www[dot]codeyeti[dot]com and the awesome client reviews on https://www.quora.com/What-is-your-review-of-CodeYeti . 
 
Hiring us is like gaining a strategic business partner, a premium design studio, a product manager, a marketing guru and a mad genius - all in one; who would make sure, we build an awesome product. We are a young team of rockstar mobile and web app developers. We don't settle - and neither should you when it's time to hire a mobile app development company.
